title: Take a Chance
description: It's hockey season! Are they going to “Take a Chance” on love and each other? The darling of Bluewood society/businesswoman Shelby McGowin seems to have it all, even a meddling aunt who is determined to see her married to a man she deems suitable. Kyle Caffin, star forward of the Bluewood Bears hockey team was surprised to see Shelby at hockey practice and was even more surprised and intrigued when she asked to the charity event, considering his working class background. Love is the one thing neither has found. Until now?
author: Debbie R. Cummings
